object.name: BusinessBotRights
object.description: Represents the rights of a business bot.
object.html_description: Represents the rights of a business bot.
object.rst_description: Represents the rights of a business bot.

annotations.description: True, if the bot can send and edit messages in the private chats that had incoming messages in the last 24 hours
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the bot can send and edit messages in the private chats that had incoming messages in the last 24 hours
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. True, if the bot can send and edit messages in the private chats that had incoming messages in the last 24 hours
annotations.name: can_reply

annotations.description: True, if the bot can mark incoming private messages as read
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the bot can mark incoming private messages as read
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. True, if the bot can mark incoming private messages as read
annotations.name: can_read_messages

annotations.description: True, if the bot can delete messages sent by the bot
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the bot can delete messages sent by the bot
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. True, if the bot can delete messages sent by the bot
annotations.name: can_delete_outgoing_messages

annotations.description: True, if the bot can delete all private messages in managed chats
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the bot can delete all private messages in managed chats
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. True, if the bot can delete all private messages in managed chats
annotations.name: can_delete_all_messages

annotations.description: True, if the bot can edit the first and last name of the business account
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the bot can edit the first and last name of the business account
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. True, if the bot can edit the first and last name of the business account
annotations.name: can_edit_name

annotations.description: True, if the bot can edit the bio of the business account
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the bot can edit the bio of the business account
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. True, if the bot can edit the bio of the business account
annotations.name: can_edit_bio

annotations.description: True, if the bot can edit the profile photo of the business account
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the bot can edit the profile photo of the business account
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. True, if the bot can edit the profile photo of the business account
annotations.name: can_edit_profile_photo

annotations.description: True, if the bot can edit the username of the business account
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the bot can edit the username of the business account
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. True, if the bot can edit the username of the business account
annotations.name: can_edit_username

annotations.description: True, if the bot can change the privacy settings pertaining to gifts for the business account
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the bot can change the privacy settings pertaining to gifts for the business account
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. True, if the bot can change the privacy settings pertaining to gifts for the business account
annotations.name: can_change_gift_settings

annotations.description: True, if the bot can view gifts and the amount of Telegram Stars owned by the business account
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the bot can view gifts and the amount of Telegram Stars owned by the business account
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. True, if the bot can view gifts and the amount of Telegram Stars owned by the business account
annotations.name: can_view_gifts_and_stars

annotations.description: True, if the bot can convert regular gifts owned by the business account to Telegram Stars
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the bot can convert regular gifts owned by the business account to Telegram Stars
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. True, if the bot can convert regular gifts owned by the business account to Telegram Stars
annotations.name: can_convert_gifts_to_stars

annotations.description: True, if the bot can transfer and upgrade gifts owned by the business account
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the bot can transfer and upgrade gifts owned by the business account
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. True, if the bot can transfer and upgrade gifts owned by the business account
annotations.name: can_transfer_and_upgrade_gifts

annotations.description: True, if the bot can transfer Telegram Stars received by the business account to its own account, or use them to upgrade and transfer gifts
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the bot can transfer Telegram Stars received by the business account to its own account, or use them to upgrade and transfer gifts
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. True, if the bot can transfer Telegram Stars received by the business account to its own account, or use them to upgrade and transfer gifts
annotations.name: can_transfer_stars

annotations.description: True, if the bot can post, edit and delete stories on behalf of the business account
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the bot can post, edit and delete stories on behalf of the business account
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. True, if the bot can post, edit and delete stories on behalf of the business account
annotations.name: can_manage_stories
